body.p: All distribution files are available on the Sourceforge project page.

section.title: Source Code
section.p: Go to the Sourceforge Project Page to download the source code.

section.title: Binary Distribution
section.p: The binary distribution is divided into two packages:

section.title: Core Package
section.p: The core package that contains the base functionality of interpreting and rendering CGM graphics.
The core package has no dependencies.

section.title: Image Package
section.p: The image package that provides an ImageIO plugin for reading CGM files and an XML Graphics loader for displaying CGM graphics in a PDF file by using FOP.

ul.li: the Apache XML Graphics Commons package
